email.subject: Diary
email.body:
That was way too close for Clara
I can't endanger her anymore Just thinking that she can go through the same hell as me is frightening me
We must do something to ensure our safety Maybe even drop the case for a few months It is not even a two-man job after all
He can easily kill us or make monsters out of us This is his game and we should stop playing it
I should go to our IRC
